properties.sfomuseum:description: Reprint of two-page advertisement from September 1944 issue of Life and Saturday Evening Post promoting Pan American World Airways, global air transport service; color illustrations of globe with route lines and Clipper Rainbow aircraft with text promoting world-wide system of passenger, mail, and cargo service to international destinations.
